about_the_game:
Under the earth, the ruins of an ancient place of worship appear after hundreds of diligent hands have removed from them the layers of earth that have accumulated over many years. The excavation site was surrounded by high cliff belts, providing adequate protection and even hiding the sacred site. On the side of the deepening digs, plenty of scaffolding and cranes are lined up to make the work easier. In the tangle of ruins, on the lowest level, the remains of a colossal skull have been unearthed, surrounded by a strange magical buzz.

This DLC contains 5 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
detailed_description:

On the side of the deepening digs, plenty of scaffolding and cranes are lined up to make the work easier. In the tangle of ruins, on the lowest level, the remains of a colossal skull have been unearthed, surrounded by a strange magical buzz.

This DLC contains 5 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
name: RPGScenery - Archaeological Site

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
